alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 2:40PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 14 inches possible over mountain passes with higher amounts above 7500 feet. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, and Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to Midnight MDT Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be difficult and visibility at times could be below one half mile. Isolated power outages possible due to the heavy wet snow. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts will be greatest during the nighttime and early morning periods.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
